name: Elevator Warp
storyline:
Your goal is simple.
Take the elevator to floor 6.
But this is no ordinary elevator...

Who knows where you'll end up.
A hotel, dungeon, hedge maze, a train?
You must travel from floor 1 to 6, working out if each floor is valid or not.
If a floor is not valid, you must press the emergency button and don't continue up, or you have to start all over again!

How do you know if a floor is valid?
If the elevator says you should be on a certain floor number, say floor 3, then any indication that you are actually on a floor of a different number is invalid!
A floor will have numerical clues, and you must find and check each one before moving on to the next floor.
These clues could be a written number on the wall or the number of objects in a pile, but they aren't always so simple.
summary: Your goal is simple. Take the elevator to floor 6. But this is no ordinary elevator... Who knows which random floor you'll end up at. A hotel, dungeon, hedge maze, a train? Check the clues on each floor to be able to progress, and achieve the perfect run!
